item.title: Get started
item.description: Get startedThis guide will instruct you through setting up and deploying your first database with D1. This guide assumes you already have a Cloudflare account. ​â€‹ 1. Install and authenticate Wrangler You will use Wrangler, a command-line tool for building Cloudflare Workers, to access D1. To install Wrangler, ensure you have npm External link icon Open external link and Node.js External link icon Open external link installed. Use a Node version manager like Volta External link icon Open external link or nvm External link icon Open external link to avoid permission issues and change Node.
